title.value: Quiz: Stop Work Authority and Safety Procedures

questions.question: What is the first step in exercising Stop Work Authority (SWA)?
The Stop Work Authority process allows any crew member, visitor, or contractor to halt unsafe activities without facing negative consequences.
In this incident, none of the deck crew exercised Stop Work Authority despite noticing that a __________ was not issued before entering the enclosed space.
Which of the following actions demonstrates a failure in Daily Work Planning according to Chapter 5C of the Health and Safety Manual?

options.value: A) Conducting a risk assessment before unplanned tasks
B) Venting the tank within port limits without permission
C) Arranging for mechanical ventilation during tank entry
D) Holding a toolbox meeting before the task

questions.question: The urgency to prepare the cargo tank led to a comprehensive risk assessment and adherence to the revised tank cleaning plan.
